translations: v.传递信息，通讯；传达，传递（想法或感情）；传染（疾病）；（房间或建筑）相通，相连；传输（热，力），传递（运动）；领受圣餐

sentences.sentence: He was eager to communicate his ideas to the group.
sentences.translation: 他急于把他的想法传达给小组。

sentences.sentence: They can communicate even when they strongly disagree.
sentences.translation: 他们即使是在有较大分歧时也能相互交流。

sentences.sentence: They successfully communicate their knowledge to others.
sentences.translation: 他们成功地把他们的知识传达给别人。
